name: Press F!
description:
QUICK, here's a dark souls breach on a...some building and we need someone to mash on the F button to stop, fortunately many time, the character you play, has a big buffy ripped arm, so go for it, go press F.

This game was made for the weekly game jam- week 165 which is 'one button mash'

This game was made by Terask with the program clickteam fusion 2.5
